title: Ted Sarandos Says Netflix Will Commit To 45-Day Window Post WB Acquisition; Doesn’t Want To “Overread” Donald Trump Comments About Merger
full_text: Ted Sarandos Says Netflix Will Commit To 45-Day Window Post WB Acquisition; Doesn’t Want To “Overread” Donald Trump Comments About Merger. Ted Sarandos has truly come full circle in his take on the theatrical window, telling the New York Times that post the streamer’s acquisition of Warner Bros, “We will run that business largely like it is today, with 45-day windows.” That’s the first time in h….
